channel.title: The Irish Sun
channel.description: Get the latest Irish and world news, sport, celebrity gossip, showbiz, pictures, videos, virals and podcasts from The Irish Sun

item.title: Fashion fans rush to Dunnes Stores for new €30 dress that is perfect for New Year’s Eve
item.dc:creator: Emma Kilcawley Hemani
item.content:encoded:
FASHION fans are in a frenzy over a new Dunnes Stores dress perfect for New Year’s.

Dunnes Stores have added a must-have dress to the shelves, and it’s a bargain.

The Savida Sienna PU Dress costs just €30[/caption] It is perfect for New Years Eve[/caption]

The Savida Sienna PU Dress costs just €30, and comes in sizes XXS to XXL.

But shoppers have already grabbed size XXS which is sold out online.

In the official item description on the Dunnes Stores website, fashion chiefs wrote: “This PU leather mini dress from Savida is defined by its panels, creating a sculpted shape that flatters the silhouette.

“Sleeveless, and complete with a back zip closure, it pairs perfectly with knee-high boots for a confident, fashion-forward look. Savida is available exclusively at Dunnes Stores.”

The dress is available to buy both online and in stores across the country but it is set to fly off the shelves.

Shoppers can wear it with a new pair of boots that are flying off the shelves.

As the temperature continues to dip, fashion fans are looking for comfort while not sacrificing style this winter.

The Leopard Western Ankle Boot are a bargain, retailing for just €30.

Available in sizes 36 to 42, the smallest size is out of stock on the website, and the rest are set to follow suit.

The boots give off a Western flair, with a black sole and and a leopard print boot.

Dunnes Stores fashion chiefs said: “Channel Western flair with these leopard-print ankle boots, featuring a soft pointed toe, squared sole, side zip, and sturdy block heel.

“Style effortlessly with denim for casual appeal or a dress for a bold occasion-ready look.”

And to complete the outfit, you can layer up with a must-have jacket also being sold by the retailer.

The Boucle Funnel Neck Jacket is set to fly off the shelves – and it costs just €35.

It is available in stores and online now. It comes in sizes XS to XXL in black.

Dunnes Stores chiefs wrote: “This loose fit jacket is crafted from a softly textured boucle fabric.

“Featuring a funnel neck for added warmth, two over-sized patch pockets, and a silky satin lining.”

The black jacket can be worn over anything from winter clothes to dresses, making it a very festive buy.

item.title: Dunnes Stores shoppers rushing to the tills for all-black outfit for €45 that is perfect for the office and night out
item.dc:creator: Emma Kilcawley Hemani
item.content:encoded:
DUNNES Stores have brought out a new all-black outfit that is perfect for the office and drinks after.

Sold separately, the retailer is selling a pair of black trousers that are perfect for the office – along with a stunning black top.

The Savida Sienna Bandeau Top is a bargain, costing just €20[/caption] The Savida Sienna Satin Trousers cost €25[/caption]

The Savida Sienna Satin Trousers double for a day in the office, or a night out.

Costing €25, shoppers can get the trousers in sizes 6 to 18.

But fashion fans are racing to pick them up, as some of the sizes are sold out online.

The only sizes left in stock online are 8, 10 and 12 – but you may be able to get the other sizes in your local shop.

In the official item description on the Dunnes Stores website, fashion chiefs wrote: “A truly stylish choice, these trousers from Savida have an always on trend wide leg design.

“Made from a satin fabric, they offer plenty of shine.

“Featuring a drawstring fastening and two front pockets, they can be dressed up or down depending on the occasion. Savida is available exclusively at Dunnes Stores.”

And to match, you can wear a gorgeous bandeau top to make the outfit even more dressy.

The Savida Sienna Bandeau Top is a bargain, costing just €20.

The top comes in sizes XXS to XXL.

The sleeveless top comes with buttons up the centre, with both sides hanging loose either side.

It is perfect for dressing up any outfit – you could wear it with jeans to make it more dressy, or with a skirt and tights for a night out on New Years Eve.

In total, the whole outfit costs just €45.

To complete the all black outfit, you can add a stunning pair of shoes on sale by the retailer.

The Savida Aurora Heeled Sandals have a festive bow and are retailing at just €30.

The shoes have a heel height of 8cm in a beautiful silver plissé fabric.

In a unique style the heel is a rounded off thick block rather than a thin stiletto or thicker square shape.

They have an ankle strap with silver hardware and the large fabric bow sits across the toe area.

Describing the shoes on their website, Dunnes Stores said: “These high-heeled sandals feature a large bow on the front, round block heels, and an ankle strap.

“These fabulous shoes will effortless glamour to any outfit.”

The shoes come in sizes 37 to 42 and luckily all sizes are still available on the website.

The silver shoes strike an uncanny resemblance to the Camellia Black Pleated Bow Heel from designer brand Loeffler and Randall.

The major difference however is that this designer version costs €445.
